Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend both "You" and "Blue Valentine".
"You", directed by David Fincher, is a psychological thriller that follows the life of a young woman named Anna who lives in New York City.
Anna has just graduated from college and she is looking for a job. One day, Anna meets a man named Paul who works as a computer programmer at a tech company located in New York City.
